mapper.select: SELECT M.*, E.NAME EMPNAME, E.DEPTNAME, E.TEAMNAME, E.POSNAME FROM MESSENGER_NEW_VIEW M, EMPLOYEE_VIEW E WHERE SEQ IN (SELECT SEQ FROM MESSENGER_VIEW WHERE EMP_CODE = #{code}) AND M.EMP_CODE = E.CODE AND ((M.EMP_CODE !=#{code} AND M.TYPE='S') OR (M.EMP_CODE = #{code} AND M.TYPE = 'M')) AND M.WRITE_DATE IS NOT NULL
SELECT M.EMP_CODE, E.NAME EMPNAME, E.DEPTNAME, E.TEAMNAME, E.POSNAME FROM MESSENGER_VIEW M, EMPLOYEE_VIEW E WHERE M.SEQ = #{seq} AND M.EMP_CODE = E.CODE

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MESSENGER WHERE SEQ IN ( SELECT M.SEQ FROM MESSENGER M, MESSENGER_PARTY MP WHERE M.SEQ = MP.M_SEQ AND MP.EMP_CODE = #{loginEmpCode} ) AND SEQ IN ( SELECT M.SEQ FROM MESSENGER M, MESSENGER_PARTY MP WHERE M.SEQ = MP.M_SEQ AND MP.EMP_CODE = #{partyEmpCode} ) AND (TYPE = 'S')

SELECT SEQ FROM MESSENGER WHERE SEQ IN ( SELECT M.SEQ FROM MESSENGER M, MESSENGER_PARTY MP WHERE M.SEQ = MP.M_SEQ AND MP.EMP_CODE = #{loginEmpCode} ) AND SEQ IN ( SELECT M.SEQ FROM MESSENGER M, MESSENGER_PARTY MP WHERE M.SEQ = MP.M_SEQ AND MP.EMP_CODE = #{partyEmpCode} ) AND (TYPE = 'S')
